summary: This adds a Psijic monk follower to the game.
descriptionHtml: This mod adds a powerful Psijic mage into the world of Skyrim. He is a level 80 follower and has multiple spells that he will use in combat, he can also use unrelenting force just like the Dragonborn. Just take note that Galfar is a very powerful mage and knows spells up to expert class level. He can be found in in Falkreath, in the Dead man\'s drink inn.
author: K9Z
